title: Cat
content:
The Cat is an animal you can pet in Brighter Shores. There are four varieties of cat. Petting the cat takes about 6 seconds. During the petting session, cartoonish two-dimensional red hearts are emitted from the cat's head and it purrs. The cat can be pet many times in a row with the same effect every time.


 * The Tuxedo cat has black fur, a white tummy, white paws, and yellow eyes.
 * The Orange Tabby has striped orange fur, a white tummy, white paws, and green eyes.
 * The Black cat is entirely black, with green eyes.
 * The Brown Bengal cat is brown with black stripes, light brown-green tummy and paws, and yellow eyes.
